extendedInfo.description: With the free Huntley Area Public Library (HAPL) mobile app, access to library services is in your hands.â¢ Find books, movies, music, audiobooks, and more.â¢ Place holds, check due dates, or renew materials on the go.â¢ Check-out library books or other items without having to wait in line by scanning library barcodes anywhere in the library.â¢ Check-out eBooks and eAudiobooks at no charge.â¢ Find out if items are available through the library by scanning ISBN codes at bookstores or other locations.â¢ Get the latest library news and find out about programs and classes.â¢ Connect with the library on Twitter and Facebook.
